BWResource::WatchAccessFromCallingThreadHolder

BWResource::WatchAccessFromCallingThreadHolder Class Reference

A utility class for temporarily changing the file access watcher state for this thread, whilst automatically restoring the old state when the class instance goes out of scope. More...

#include <bwresource.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 WatchAccessFromCallingThreadHolder (bool newState)
 ~WatchAccessFromCallingThreadHolder ()

Detailed Description

A utility class for temporarily changing the file access watcher state for this thread, whilst automatically restoring the old state when the class instance goes out of scope.
